p: To determine local MeV seroprevalence, we retrieved the results of MeV antibody screenings routinely performed in all employees at the University of Padova and Padova University Hospital for preventive medicine evaluation. Age range of the subjects was 20â€“65 years. Two time intervals were considered, i.e., January 2009 to December 2012 and January 2014 to December 2017.
